#include<stdio.h>

int main(){
	int T,N,i,j,k,c1,c2,ans,cont;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--){
		scanf("%d",&N);
		int A[N],B[N];
		for(i=0;i<N;i++) scanf("%d",&A[i]);
		for(i=0;i<N;i++) scanf("%d",&B[i]);
		//for(i=0;i<N;i++) printf("%d ",A[i]);
		//putchar('\n');
		//for(i=0;i<N;i++) printf("%d ",B[i]);
		//putchar('\n');
		cont=ans=c1=c2=0;
		scanf("%d",&k);
		while(k!=0){
			if(cont==1){
				scanf("%d",&k);
				continue;
			} 
			for(i=0;i<N;i++){
				if(A[i]==k){
					A[i]=-1;
					c1++;
				}
				if(B[i]==k){
					B[i]=-1;
					c2++;
				}
			}
			if(c1==N&&c2==N){ans=3;cont=1;}
			else if(c1==N){ans=1;cont=1;}
			else if(c2==N){ans=2;cont=1;}
			scanf("%d",&k);
		}
		switch(ans){
			case 0:puts("0");continue;
			case 1:puts("MIKE");continue;
			case 2:puts("HARRY");continue;
			case 3:puts("MIKE HARRY");continue;
			default:puts("0");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
